name: checkinn
description: CheckInn - Website Đặt Phòng Khách Sạn | Hotel Booking Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.health: powershell -Command "try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:5000/health' -Method GET | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Content } catch { Write-Host 'Server not running' }"
scripts.api:info: powershell -Command "try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:5000/api' -Method GET | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Content } catch { Write-Host 'Server not running' }"
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.docs: echo 'CheckInn Documentation:' && echo '- Progress: docs/PROGRESS_REPORT.md' && echo '- Summary: STATUS_SUMMARY.md' && echo '- README: README.md'
scripts.test:health: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Testing server health...' && try { $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:5000/health' -Method GET; Write-Host 'Server Status: OK'; $response.Content } catch { Write-Host 'Server Status: Not Running' }"
scripts.info: echo 'CheckInn - Website Đặt Phòng Khách Sạn' && echo 'Repository: https://github.com/YouAreMyHome/CheckInn_WebDatPhong.git' && echo 'Version: 2.0.0' && echo 'Status: Backend Core Complete' && echo 'Server: http://localhost:5000' && echo 'Use: npm start (to run server)'

author: YouAreMyHome Team
